The best gaming franchise of all time!
Easy to learn but very difficult to master. There's always a new map, spot, smoke grenade or gun to learn. That makes this a  game you never really quit playing, you might take a pause but you'll always come back for more.

Also the best esport without a doubt.
Only grievance with this game is the fact that i paid for it annnd its now FREE...  Otherwise its pretty damn good.
